title: FO-03: Onboarding Steps 0-4
description:
Implement welcome steps (0-3) and topic selection (step 4)

## Context

**Spec:** `docs/projects/2026-01-23-FO-03/2026-01-23-FO-03-spec.md`

**Key files for this epic:**
- `app/fo-02/components/step-welcome.tsx` - reference welcome pattern
- `app/fo-02/components/step-intent.tsx` - reference selection pattern
- `app/fo-02/components/fo-experience.tsx` - reference state management

**Steps covered:**
- Step 0: Welcome screen
- Step 1: First name input
- Step 2: Personalized welcome
- Step 3: Familiarity question (3 options + confetti)
- Step 4: Topic multi-select (chips + confetti)
notes:

Key differences from FO-02: removed emojis (per guidelines), Step 0 has separate headline + description (vs combined in FO-02), Step 2 CTA is 'Start' instead of 'Continue'. Component follows same props pattern: currentStep, name, onNameChange, onContinue. fo-experience.tsx updated to import and render StepWelcome. Next tasks (8kg step-familiarity, k9v step-topics) should follow same pattern: create component, then update fo-experience.tsx switch statement.
2026-01-23 08:21 - 8kg complete: Created step-familiarity.tsx with 3 button options (New/Some/Very familiar). Uses canvas-confetti for confetti animation on selection, Framer Motion AnimatePresence for transitions. Shows 'Super, {name}\!' message and auto-advances after 1.5s. Added canvas-confetti and @types/canvas-confetti to package.json (run npm install). Next task k9v should follow same pattern.
2026-01-23 08:23 - k9v complete: Created step-topics.tsx with all 36 topic chips from spec. Uses same pattern as step-familiarity: AnimatePresence for transitions, confetti on Continue, 'Great choices\!' success message, 1.5s auto-advance. Has two CTAs: 'Continue' (disabled until selection, triggers confetti flow) and 'Not sure' (calls onSkip to advance without confetti). Props: currentStep, name, topics, onTopicsChange, onContinue, onSkip. Chip toggle uses same toggleTopic pattern from FO-02 step-intent. fo-experience.tsx updated to import and render StepTopics at case 4.
